I believe in making science accessible beyond academia. I frequently contribute to media outlets and educational projects to share our findings on cetacean conservation.

## Science Communication

I actively produce content to bridge the gap between scientific research and the general public.

I am a recurring author at [*The Conversation*](https://theconversation.com/), an independent source of news and views from the academic and research community.
